Tyrael greeted Crusher with a nod.

Tyrael: Welcome to the Tripredacus Strikers, Crusher. I hope your 
skills will be useful to us. Now for- (he receives the transmission 
from Spikes and opens a channel) No Spikes, don't attempt anything on 
them now. They are in Maximal territory so it is likely they could get 
help. There was a pod landing near our base. A third lifeform is 
located there too. Go investigate there for now. Base out.

He throws some long feathers back, oddly forming a cape. Meanwhile, 
Shadow Star comes out of the CR Chamber. Silently moving, he stops 
next to his superior.

Shadow Star: I am back, Major.

Tyrael: Good. We can now start. As you all know, we have met little 
success in our first encounter with the Predacons. There were many 
units that entered combat and the loss of Burrock only made it worse. 
That made us go out of the cover of secrecy. Most factions know the 
location of our base and I don't think Megatron liked my bragging 
about getting him. From now on, we must expect no quarters, and give 
none. We're lucky because we're alone on our continent. This is 
easier to monitor unit movement. But now, we'll stop to use the 
defense position. We have to know where to strike. We need to scout 
and find our enemies, because they are not only the predacons and 
maximals. And perhaps we can ally with this new faction that arrived 
on planet some times ago, as the computer reported. Are there 
volunteers?


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "deltazero1" <DeltaZero1@h...> wrote:
> Talon was working on the top on the base and crusher stood over him 
> holding a large triple laser turret on his shoulder while talon 
> started to connect wires "ok set it down here" he said stepping back 
> a bit as crusher put it down with a large thud "ok that finished up 
> the weapon defence" talon said as he walked towards the bridges sun 
> roof and gave the command for it to up so he could jump down "main 
> defences up and rdy sir" he landing a few feet away from the others 
> and moved to the side abit before crusher jumped down and making a 
> good deal of the room rumble as his landed "and this is crusher my 
> weapons officer" he said looking over at crusher large body
